SEARCH
Package shapes

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
alexlewis9.shapes.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Line, Rectangle, RegularPolygon
public abstract class Shape extends Object
This alexlewis9.shapes.Shape class represents a double precision shape that can be drawn using the Processing library.
